revision.text:
__NOTOC__{{codepointer|Sound}} void '''A_StopSounds''' (int ''chanmin'', int ''chanmax'')
==Usage== Stops the sounds that are playing by the calling actor on the specified range of [[sound channels]]. If 0 is passed to both parameters, then the function acts exactly like {{c|[[A_StopAllSounds]]}}, stopping all the sounds that are playing by the calling actor.
===Parameters=== *''chanmin'': the start of the sound channels range. *''chanmax'': the end of the sound channels range.
==Examples== {{noexamples}} ==See also== *[[A_StartSound]] *[[A_StopSound]]
